scripts.build: lerna run --scope @qgrid/core build && lerna run --scope @qgrid/plugins build && lerna run --scope @qgrid/ngx build && lerna run --scope @qgrid/ngx-plugins build && lerna run --scope ng2-qgrid build && node ./scripts/build.theme.js && lerna run --scope @qgrid/theme-basic build && lerna run --scope @qgrid/theme-material build && lerna run --scope ng2-qgrid-app build
